properties.description:
This trigger is scheduled to run daily for the zbb base tables . This will cover the following tables : ZBB_ENTITY_MAPPING_DIM,ZBB_PACKAGE_MAPPING_DIM,ZBB_KST_ACTUALS_FACT,ZBB_BUDGET_FACT,ZBB_CAT_ACTUALS_FACT,ZBB_BPCS_ACTUALS_FACT,
ZBB_EPICOR_ACTUALS_FACT,ZBB_LE_LESNAPSHOT_FACT,ZBB_JDE_ACTUALS_FACT,ZBB_ORACLE_ACTUALS_FACT
